title: Mountain Of The Sun
lyrics:
Sunshine smiling from above
And you’re the woman that I love
Climb the mountain even higher
And kiss the sun and find the fire
Oooh well



I’ll make you mine

You’re not so sure

I’ll make you mine

You’re not so sure



Take me with you when you go

And leave with you that’s all I know

... the fire

... hearts desire



Oooh well



I’ll make you mine

You’re not so sure

I’ll make you mine

You’re not so sure



Oooh well



Sunshine smiling from above

And you’re the woman that I love

Climb the mountain even higher
